QuestData.Title: A Symbol of Hope
QuestData.Description:
Before Anduin followed the Jailer through the gateway, he dropped something.
I don't think this was part of the Jailer's plan. It must be a sign that Anduin's soul is still his own!
<Jaina opens her hand to show you a golden compass.>
This was very personal to Anduin. I feel his presence upon it.
We need to know why he left it for us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Jaina in examining Anduin's compass.
